summary: REQ-11/12/13 appear implemented: header logo text and homepage hero title now use siteData.brandName, siteData.brandName is set to "TechChandan AI Design", and the base HTML <title> includes the new brand name. Additionally, the footer branding was updated to use siteData.brandName (not explicitly requested).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer brand/logo text updated to render {siteData.brandName} (centralized branding in footer as well, beyond the header/homepage/metadata requirements).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies updating the header logo text, homepage hero title, and site metadata/config; it does not request changes to footer branding.
